name: Tapu Lele
description: The Land Spirit Pokémon. As it flutters about, it scatters its strangely glowing scales. Touching them is said to restore good health on the spot.

abilities.name: Psychic Surge
abilities.description: If the move is known, this Pokémon may use the Psychic Terrain move as a bonus action.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be damaged by its allies' attacks.
